suggestions: This resume is completely unsuitable for an acting position.  It focuses on graphic design.  The applicant needs to create a new resume highlighting acting experience, training, and skills relevant to the acting profession.
List all acting roles, including small parts, student films, theater productions, etc.
Quantify achievements in previous roles.  Instead of generic descriptions, provide specific examples of successful performances or contributions.
Highlight any relevant skills such as improvisation, voice training, dialect coaching, stage combat, etc.
Include a headshot or professional photograph.
Remove the graphic design-focused skills and experience.
Replace the references with those who can speak to your acting abilities.
Consider adding a portfolio link showcasing acting reels or headshots.
